articles.title: 17 February 2007: Ronaldo scores his first two goals for the Rossoneri in Siena
articles.summary: On 17 February 2007, during a Siena-Milan match valid for the 24th matchday of Serie A, Ronaldo, the phenomenon, scored his first goal in the Rossoneri shirt in the 16th minute of the first half (header following an assist from Pirlo).
